abstracts.cdata!:
Project ratings are as follows: Outcome
            is satisfactory; project sustainability is likely;
            institutional development impact is modest; and Bank and
            Borrower performances are satisfactory. Lessons discussed
            were the benefits of privatized road maintenance; the need
            for road funds to have adequate assured sources of finance,
            independence and an effective governance structure; the
            ability of road agencies to be helped to restructure
            maintenance with the necessary political support and well
            targeted outside assistance; the need for technical
            assistance; an emphasis on incremental improvement, possibly
            involving a series of operations, as more likely to be
            realistic and effective; and the need to address competing
            job opportunities in neighboring countries by providing
            higher pay scale and benefits, continuing education
            opportunities and in some cases long term and/or
            intermittent technical assistance.
